Key Match Events: USA defeated Pakistan in a super over to win the T20 Cricket World Cup match
Monank Patel scored 50 runs for USA
Aaron Jones scored 36 runs for USA
Saurabh Netravalkar bowled well in a pressured situation for USA
Post-Match Reflections: This defeat leaves Pakistan struggling to qualify for the Super 8 stage
For the USA, they also face India in their next fixture, but victory in their final group game against Ireland, on June 14, should be enough to see them through to the Super 8 stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA, ranked 18th in the world, have never played in the T20 World Cup before
The U.S. now stand a strong chance of qualifying for the Super 8 round

Haris Rauf bowled Gous for USA
Mohammad Amir bowled poorly in the super over for Pakistan
